title: Purpose
context: [PART XIX.] YOUNG ADULT VOLUNTARY FOSTER CARE PROGRAM [ยง346-391] Purpose. The purpose of this part is to establish the young adult voluntary foster care program, to care for and assist eligible foster youth until their twenty-first birthday. The young adult voluntary foster care program will support former foster youth in the transition to adulthood and in becoming independent and self-sufficient. [L 2013, c 252, pt of ยง2]
